engine

Class GraphToolkit

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.GraphToolkit

  • public class GraphToolkit
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides access to all of the algorithms found in the Centrality, Flow, and Search classes. It is the external API for the Graph Toolkit.

    • Constructor Summary

      private GraphToolkit()

    • Method Detail

      • bfs

        public static java.util.List<Node> bfs(Graph g,
                       Node src,
                       Node tgt,
                       boolean flow)
        A BFS Implementation to find the shortest path from src to tgt. Since this is BFS, the shortest path is in terms of length, not weights.
        Parameters:
        g - the Graph
        src - the node to start BFS from
        tgt - the node to end BFS at
        flow - whether or not this is BFS on a flow graph
        Returns:
        the shortest path from src to tgt.

      • dfs

        public static java.util.Map<Node,java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> dfs(Graph g,
                                                        Node src)

      • getSCC

        public static void getSCC(Graph g)

      • allPairsShortestPath

        public static java.util.Map<Node,java.util.Map<Node,java.lang.Double>> allPairsShortestPath(Graph g)
        Finds all-pairs shortest paths by implementing the Floyd-Warshall algorithm
        Parameters:
        g - the input graph
        Returns:
        a map representing the all-pairs shortest path matrix

      • maxFlow

        public static int maxFlow(Graph g,
          Node src,
          Node tgt)
        Implement the Ford-Fulkerson algorithm for finding maximum flow on a network.
        Parameters:
        g - The graph to find
        src - the starting node
        tgt - the ending node
        Returns:
        the maximum flow from src -> tgt on the graph g

      • btwCentrality

        public static java.util.Map<Node,java.lang.Double> btwCentrality(Graph g)
        Calculates the betweeness centrality for each node using Brandes' algorithm.
        Parameters:
        g - the Graph whose values should be calculated
        Returns:
        a map containing the betweeness centrality values

      • commDetection

        public static void commDetection(Graph g)

      • pageRank

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> pageRank(Graph g)
        Find the Eigenvector Centrality of a graph using the dampened PageRank formula
        Parameters:
        g - the graph to run PageRank on
        Returns:
        a map from node id to rank
